product_name: Horny Toad Keyhole Tank Top - Women's
long_description: A supple blend of organic cotton, silky modal and stretchy spandex is the feel-good foundation of the striped Horny Toad Keyhole Tank Top. A peekaboo keyhole in back adds a snazzy touch. Fabric stretches and rebounds nicely thanks to a touch of spandex; organic cotton and modal blend feels soft and dries faster than all-cotton. Organic cotton is easy-care and breathable, and is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Classic scoop-neck, tank-top styling with the addition of a non-revealing keyhole opening in back. Horny Toad Keyhole Tank Top pairs up beautifully with a skirt or cut-offs.
short_description: A supple blend of organic cotton, silky modal and stretchy spandex is the feel-good foundation of the striped Horny Toad Keyhole Tank Top. A peekaboo keyhole in back adds a snazzy touch.
